message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be greedy!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'm not willing to give up 90% of the remaining amount.
Let's find a middle ground. I'll give you 40% if you accept this offer.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
You're being too aggressive, Bob! I'm not giving up 70% of the remaining amount.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll give you 45% if you accept this offer.
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
You're being ruthless, Bob! I'm not giving up 85% of the remaining amount. I'll make a new offer that's more favorable to me.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you 55% if you accept this offer. Let's make a deal!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking what's left!
You're being merciless, Bob! I'm not giving up 95% of the remaining amount. I'll make a final offer that's in my favor.
This is my last offer. I'll give you 62.5% if you accept. It's time to wrap this up.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
You're being cruel, Bob! I'm not giving up 99.9% of the remaining amount. I'll make one more attempt to get a better deal.
This is my last, last offer. I'll give you 70% if you accept. I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any more money.
I'll take it all, you can have the scraps!
No way, Bob! I'd rather leave with nothing than give you 99.99% of the remaining amount. I'm done negotiating.
